Package ball.maven.plugins.artifact

artifact-maven-plugin Mojos.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AttachedArtifact
    Attached <artifact/> parameter base interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractArtifactMojo
    Mojo.
    AbstractArtifactMojo.AbstractAttachedArtifact
    <artifact/> parameter abstract base class.
    ArtifactAttachMojo
    Mojo to attach (zero or more) artifacts to a project.
    ArtifactAttachMojo.Artifact
    <artifact/> parameter.
    ArtifactMainMojo
    Mojo to set project main artifact.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on ball-artifact-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn ball-artifact:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Retain
    Annotation to prevent javac from discarding package-info.class.

Package ball.maven.plugins.artifact Description

artifact-maven-plugin Mojos.

Artifact Attach Maven Plugin

GoalPhaseDescription
attachpackage

Mojo to attach (zero or more) artifacts to a project. .plugin.fields

help

Display help information on ball-artifact-maven-plugin. Call mvn ball-artifact:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

mainpackage

Mojo to set project main artifact. .plugin.fields

Version:
$Revision: 7215 $
Author:
Allen D. Ball
